title: Rx Savings' Rea on Mylan Under Scrutiny for EpiPen Price(Audio)
itunes:title: Rx Savings' Rea on Mylan Under Scrutiny for EpiPen Price(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Michael Rea, CEO of Rx Savings Solutions, to discuss Mylan's EpiPen price hike, currently under scrutiny.
